H0.text: Magma is below ground whereas lava is above ground.

H1.text: Magma is cool, while lava is hot, explaining the difference between magma and lava.

H2.text: Magma comes out of earthquakes; lava comes out of volcanoes, which explains the difference between magma and lava.

H3.text: Magma is solid and lava is liquid, which describes the difference between magma and lava.

A4.text: Magma is found beneath the surface of the Earth

A5.text: Magma consists of liquid rock that usually contains suspended solid crystals
